dct_title_s: The Daily Telegraph war graves map of the Western Front
dct_alternative_sm: War graves map of the Western Front
dct_description_sm: compiled from official sources under the direction of Alexander Gross.
Map of the Western Front in France and Belgium showing cemeteries, railways and stations, roads, and canals.

"The red dots indicate the positions of the cemeteries, the names of which will be found in the Index with the corresponding number to that on the map. The insets numbered 1, 2, 3 and 4, cover, on a larger scale, the corresponding areas on the main map"
"Figures denote heights in metres. 1 metre - 3.28 feet (about 3 feet and 3 inches) Land intersected with Dykes divided into five mile squares"
"Places outside the limits of this map will be found in the "Daily Telegraph" map no. 4, Western Europe. A list of these places is given at the end of the Index to this map"
National Library of Australia's copy has annotations on map. ANL
